title: stix1x-network-socket-extension-schema
description: This is the wrapper for the network-traffic/network-socket extension is used by the stix-elevator

protocol_family.description: Specifies the communication domain (PF_*) of the socket

local_address.description: Specifies the IP address and port for the socket on the local machine

remote_address.description: Specifies the IP address and port for the socket on the remote machine
